questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: A temple complex in Cambodia and is the largest religious monument in the world. Where am I?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: I am standing about three miles west of the town of Amesbury, Wiltshire, England, admiring a megalithic structure that has puzzled scholars for millennia. What am I looking at?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: I am standing on a remote Siberian hillside, looking at the remains of a devastating explosion that occurred in the early part of the twentieth century. Where am I?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: I am a merchant of the late Minoan civilization, I have left my home of Crete to set up shop on this island in the center of the Aegean Sea. My life is ended suddenly by a catastrophic event that is quite possibly going to give rise to the myth of Atlantis. Where am I?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: I am standing on top of one of the world's most famous rocks, a true Herculean Pillar, two countries have bickered over control of this small peninsula for many years. There is a theory that, in the remote past, this was the site of a gigantic waterfall, the like of which has not been seen on Earth again.

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: I am standing on top of one of the oldest and biggest man made structures on the planet which is at least 6,352 km (3,948 miles) long. What is it?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: A spooky ghost town that is abandoned due to a nuclear accident. Where am I?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: The burial site of Carolus Magnus, King of the Franks, anxiously anticipating the next public exhibition of his relics, which occurs every seven years. Where am I?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: The oldest and largest of three pyramids in Greater Cairo, Egypt. Where am I?

questions.title: Round 1 - Where am I if?
questions.text: It sits on Borovitsky Hill, rising above the Moscow River in the centre of the city. Where am I?
